Description:
A variant of the 100mm HE shell with a greater length and more explosive capacity at the expense of armor penetration.  Most useful against targets which have had the armor stripped off by plasma barrage.

Type: Ballistic/Chemical
Size: 100mm
Role: Offensive
Armor Penetration: 8 cm
Component Damage: 70 hp
Penetration Depth: 30 m
Explosion Radius: 10
Muzzle Velocity: 900 m/s
Range: 7,200 m
Volume: 0.05 mÂ³
